name: Sa/vage
description:
After 48 hours worth of jamming, I present: Sa/vage

A top-down shooter where your ammunition also servers as your health and currency to buy upgrades with. the game itself only consists of 3 short levels and you should be able to beat it within 5 minutes (if you don't die).

The GMTK jam is the first jam I've ever participated in, needless to say it was quite an experience. there are some things I didn't have time to add in (i.e. sound) but otherwise I think everything went pretty well.

Any and all feedback is welcome, maybe (one day) I might expand on this idea.
